cause.description:
Its pretty simple people! We're not asking for your money! We're just asking for some time of yours to think about this cause. All you will have to do is send or collect toys that you dont use - new ones or old. Collect them and make school/college/university chapters.. make this thing huge!!! Show your Support! Help us in this cause so that poor children can afford to live their younger years with toys they cannot afford!..
Make all the young ones smile They have all the right in this world to be happy :)
http://www.giftsinkind.org/toybank/default.htm
Please join and tell all your friends about this as well!
1. Its every childs right to play with toys!!!
2. Free toys for all the poor kids!!!
cause.mission: To bring joy, happiness and comfort to children in need through the experience of toys and play.
cause.name: TheToyBank (Pakistan Chapter)
